column3: Mostly I think it's essential that we do a release with a forced rescan prior to doing a release that supports turning on pruning that will make rescans infeasible (or at least a slow network traffic generating event).\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/95c7db3dbf4012dd02e5f1f30e6d982341facaa6 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

ACK.

Synced testnet chain while watching bestblock record in wallet.dat, it changed at the right times.

ACK. 

In valgrind, tried three different wallets, including old ones with no bestblock record and a empty one. Tested starts and stops, and a reindex.  Looks okay and does not rescan on a new wallet.
